#summary Installation instructions
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

Installing NautilusSvn is the easiest using Ubuntu, simply download [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/downloads/list the Debian package] and off you go. For other distributions you have to fetch the [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/downloads/list tarball] and do a manual installation using:

{{{
sudo python setup.py
nautilus -q && nautilus . &
}}}
